Welcome to Muse Bridal

Muse Bridal is located in a rather well known and sought after location in the picturesque market town of Newport, Shropshire.

123 High Street has been home to a bridal and special occasion wear boutique for nearly twenty years with beautiful gowns and outfits having been framed in itâ€™s windows for so long that they have become somewhat of a well-loved, local landmark!

Prior to Muse opening the doors to this stylish, classic period property, there has been a complete redesign not only in the decor and style but also in the selection of the chosen designer stockists. The boutique now exudes calm and femininity.

Come in and say hello

Passion for traditional personal service with modern flair await at our truly unique boutique and we look forward to welcoming you at Muse Bridal.
